title: Teaching on a Full Moon
description:
This week, Joe gets back in the classroom in one of the most dangerous teaching scenarios, during a full moon! Throw in a bucket of maple syrup and the worlds most effective pencil sharpener and you have a recipe for a crazy wild day in the classroom!
